column6: "IN WHICH HEARTS REND AND HEADS ROLL" Enchantress's prophecy strangles Angela and Sera from all sides when they are forced to ride hell (and a few other realms, too) for leather to the distant coast. In a haunted castle, a tormented witchbreed girl named Anna Maria â€" a.k.a. the 1602 Rogue â€" makes a deadly deal â€" with a shocking price! Kieron and Frazer Irving bring to life the first tale Angela tells that is her very own â€" as the forces of Faerie close in!
